rows.label: qst003503_msg0001
rows.name: A Morph Orb... It's just like my dad's!

rows.label: qst003503_msg0002
rows.name: Thank you, Driver-san! Blade-san!

rows.label: qst003503_msg0003
rows.name:
Look! Karze! I brought another
Morph Orb, just like you said!

rows.label: qst003503_msg0004
rows.name: ...It's the same.

rows.label: qst003503_msg0005
rows.name: Hmph! Fine. I'll give it back.

rows.label: qst003503_msg0006
rows.name:
Next time your father is
salvaging inside the base,

rows.label: qst003503_msg0007
rows.name: I'll report him to my father as a spy!

rows.label: qst003503_msg0008
rows.name: My dad isn't here anymore.

rows.label: qst003503_msg0009
rows.name: What...?

rows.label: qst003503_msg0010
rows.name:
He died because of Superbia's
Blade recruitment.

rows.label: qst003503_msg0011
rows.name:
Karze, you said that things
taken from the Superbian
base belong to you.

rows.label: qst003503_msg0012
rows.name:
My dad died because of Superbia...
Does that mean you...

rows.label: qst003503_msg0013
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]That's not true!!

rows.label: qst003503_msg0014
rows.name: I... I would never... a person...

rows.label: qst003503_msg0015
rows.name:
Hey... if this continues,
we'll just keep fighting.

rows.label: qst003503_msg0016
rows.name:
And someday, we might
actually start a real war.

rows.label: qst003503_msg0017
rows.name: A fight... a war?

rows.label: qst003503_msg0018
rows.name:
Karze, you're the child of someone
important in Superbia, right?

rows.label: qst003503_msg0019
rows.name:
Please, do something so
that doesn't happen!

rows.label: qst003503_msg0020
rows.name:
Th-that's impossible! My
father isn't that...

rows.label: qst003503_msg0021
rows.name: You will?

rows.label: qst003503_msg0022
rows.name:
Yeah, look! These people are
all from different countries,
but they get along so well.

rows.label: qst003503_msg0023
rows.name: I'm sure we can too...

rows.label: qst003503_msg0024
rows.name:
H-hmph! When I become important, of
course I won't let a war happen!

rows.label: qst003503_msg0025
rows.name: I don't like getting hurt!

rows.label: qst003503_msg0026
rows.name: Yeah! Thank you, Driver-san, Blade-san!

rows.label: qst003503_msg0027
rows.name:
Hey, Karze! Teach me how
to play a game sometime.

rows.label: qst003503_msg0028
rows.name:
In Superbia, everyone
plays Pipe Jenga, right?

rows.label: qst003503_msg0029
rows.name:
Sure, I'll teach you! Pipe
Jenga is my favorite game!

rows.label: qst003503_msg0030
rows.name:
In exchange, you have to take
me to that shop that sells
Moonlight Banana Au Lait.

rows.label: qst003503_msg0031
rows.name: Okay, deal! Let's go!
